action.action-desc: Mr. Duffy (for himself and Mr. Welch) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To assist and incentivize organic agriculture by expanding its access to, and eligibility for, Federal rural development and agricultural loan programs.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Organic Farmers Access Act.

section.header: Expansion of access of organic agriculture to, and eligibility of organic agriculture for, Federal rural development and agricultural loan programs
